title: An great place with amazing ocean views
text:
We really love this place! The accommodations are spacious, clean and well serviced. All of the aspects of our room were functioning very well, i.e., lighting, a/c, and a kitchenette.
We especially liked the quiet, private location.

title: A touch of modernism
text: Dining at this restaurant and bar was a pleasant change from all of the local restaurants in Lubang Probang because of the environment. The Restaurant is next to the 5 star Avina Hotel and it is modern and very clean.

title: One of the most beautiful spas in Lubang Prabang
text: Having had dozens of spas over the years, the spa at this hotel is super! I tried four different types over a two week period and always went back.
place: The Spa at Kiridara Luang Prabang

title: We had a delicious and unique dinner
text: We had a delicious and unique meal of Laotian food here very authentic. It’s a small place but outdoors and the staff was very accommodating. Our entire meal including appetizers main courses and drinks was under $10 amazing

title: Another good place to have a meal
text: Another good place to have dinner. We sat at a roundtable a few steps above the sidewalk watching the people go by. There’s also a bar inside as well as a garden setting in the back

title: We spontaneously stopped here
text: We spontaneously stopped here for dinner one evening. What drew me in, was that it was a hot night and a sign outside said, “air conditioned”. (Make sure you go to second floor). We ordered Pad Thai, and it was delicious.

title: Add this place to your dining experience in LP
text: Creative Local cuisine. This restaurant is a training restaurant for marginalized youth. You would never know it, because the dishes that are served are excellent. They must have a very good supervisor.

title: Great spot
text: We recommended this restaurant to our friends and they loved it. All of the dishes are made from fresh ingredients and taste wonderful.

title: Every night!
text: Local vendors set up their wares every night. We strolled through the market place buying locally made products as gifts and for ourselves.

title: Excellent restaurant
text: We have not returned to this place twice because the food was so good. It offers local dishes all of which were excellent.

title: Cook away
text: We attended this cooking school and loved it. The session was actually six hours long, but included a trip to the local market where we purchased the ingredients we needed. Once back in the restaurant, we learned how to cook several dishes.

title: Excellent
text: Had a wonderful stay here for one night, while transiting to Luang Prabang. The accommodations were very comfortable as was the excellent service. We had dinner in their very spacious restaurant, probably able to seat more than 200 people.

title: The Best!
text: Stayed 3 nights here and did not want to leave. The hotel is absolutely beautiful. A unique outdoor pool with fountains and jacuzzi throughout. Food was delicious. Would stay again. And, should not forget the Service!

title: Classic Spanish Restaurant
text: Enjoyed a pleasant dinner meal. The restaurant has a classic semi-formal look, but is very casual among it’s clientele.

title: Great neighborhood find
text: Stopped in this bar/restaurant for dinner and was pleasantly surprised. All of the dishes we ordered were delicious

title: All the menu items we selected
text: All the menu items we selected (4) were delicious. The raviolis were very tasty as was the chicken piccata

title: This Asian restaurant rocks
text: This Asian restaurant lived up to it’s name with delicious menu items, and there were many. We found several Chinese restaurants in Fiumicino, but this one was the best.

title: Wonderful place
text: Stayed here on our way from Matera to Rome, being a half way point. The hotel service was excellent as was the restaurant. Breakfast was offered each day and dinner was excellent. We recommend this hotel.

title: A fun ride
text: We took the tram to Bario Alto, high above the city. It is an old tram but in excellent condition. Recommended.

title: Excellent hotel
text: We stayed here two nights prior to our cruise on Seabourn. The room was very comfortable and spacious. We had dinner one evening in the hotel and it was very good. I swam in their heated pool while Don used the hymn.

title: One of several outdoor restaurants
text: One of several outdoor restaurants in this Piazza. Located on Via San Biagio 37. Delicious bruschetta, lasagna, salads and vegan option.

title: One of the most unique places in the world
text: Walking around the historic part of Matera is very interesting. People lived in caves and have now turned any of them into comfortable homes.

title: A great local find!
text: After being turned away from two Italian restaurants, we found this one, and waited 25 minutes before being seated. It was definitely worth the wait! The restaurant has many different rooms on three levels and can accommodate about 200 people. The menu was varied and everything we ordered was excellent.

title: A very unique town
text: Civita has been crumbling for quite some time. Efforts are being made to shore up the town. The walk to it is different as it is up a steep walkway.

title: A very unique town
text: We were staying at a resort nearby and drove to Gubbio for the day. A small town, but very upscale. Apparently, the wealth is held by a few families. One of them makes cement and has factories around the world. Don’t miss the caged ride to the top for a great view.

title: There are two fixed menus
text: We were overwhelmed with the amount of food served! Six large appetizers and then a main course. Everything was very good.

title: One of many restaurants along a whole street of restaurants.
text: One of many restaurants along the Main Street. It is recommended to make reservations, as we waited in the bar for half an hour.

title: Clemente is the oldest restaurant
text: Clemente is the oldest restaurant in Sulmona, and was recommended by our host. We found it to be ok, nothing really special.

title: Had a delicious lunch here
text: Had a delicious lunch here the other day. All pastas are made fresh! We had ravioli with Straitiata cheese. Excellent. Going back for pizza tomorrow evening, as that is the only time pizza is served.

title: Extraordinary
text: We loved this restaurant, even though it was large with numerous rooms and noisy. The uniqueness of the menu, either tapas or full menu was amazing.

title: If you like falafel, you will love this place
text: In a different twist, the falafels offered at this chain are either, Iraqi, Turkish or Palestinian. My favorite is usually Israeli, but since it wasn’t offered here, I chose Palestinian and it was fantastic.

title: Fabulous place
text: There are several options for dining at this place. It is a gourmet market and has a restaurant. The offerings are abundant and delicious.

title: A very plain restaurant, but worth the visit
text: With a name like Sova Vegan Butcher, one could be confused as to what they offer, but be clear, it is a vegan restaurant.

title: A sprawling Castle
text: Visited several parts of the Castle, both inside and out. Beautiful grounds, a rooftop garden and restaurant.

title: Fun bar
text: Stopped at this bar, one of thousands in Dublin. We stopped counting! Had a Guinness and a Murphy’s. Both delicious.

title: Good but too oily
text: Really like Asian foods of all types, but the meal today was a bit too greasy. Should have asked for more drier food.

title: Good Cuban food
text: There were four of us for dinner. As a vegan, I thought I might find a couple of items on the menu, but did not. Settled for a salad.

title: Good choice
text: We had dinner at this restaurant and really enjoyed everything we ordered. There are daily specials and worth choosing them.

title: Birthday dinner
text: The restaurant is very luxurious and attractive. The service was excellent and the menu choices we ordered were delicious. It has a view of the water and yachts. The only concerning point is that the prices on each dish were expensive.

title: One month in the Greek Islands
text: The flights service was good, but the seats in business are not as comfortable of as spacious as other airlines.

title: Interesting place
text: This beach offers a combination of options. Nude, families, and “campers” A very comfortable beach and beautiful ocean waters. The only caveat is the walk/climb to get there.

title: Beautiful waters
text: This beach was 3 minutes from our hotel (and several others). It is a sandy beach with clear water. There is a wooden board walk on the beach, making it easier to walko

title: Good Greek food
text: We had lunch one day and ordered moussaka and a Greek salad, sharing both of them. Both dishes were traditional and delicious. There is another restaurant to the left, but not recommended

title: Comfortable spot by the sea
text: While walking in the old city, we came upon the outdoor modern bar. Had a couple of drinks and then left. The drinks were good but the service was slow.

title: Good place on beach
text: Comfortable bar/restaurant on beach with chaise lounges. They also have some special ones, double wide with canopy. Good service.

title: Unbelievably poor......
text: I am mystified at all of the positive ratings, as the food was not good at all! Example: Sea pastrami is a very salty piece of cod in oil. Next, we had a tomato and feta mixture on a hard roll, topping ok, but a hard roll underneath? Had fresh fish dish, too many bones, and finally, the one good dish was eggplant with melted cheese atop.

title: A great find
text: booked this hotel and was pleasantly surprised on how convenient everything was. It is a comfortable hotel, adjacent to the beach. Breakfast, wi-fi and shuttle service from airport and port. Lovely large pool too.

title: Wonderful pasteries
text: Found this bakery on a small side street, as directed by a local resident. I was looking for a special Greek dessert called “Kalkaburico” (not the correct spelling) but amazingly delicious.

title: Very good
text: Delicious Greek salad and tzazeki and mousaka. Sitting along the water with cool breezes and a good place to people watch

title: Very good Indian cuisine
text: First time visit to Bombay Darbar. It is a beautiful restaurant with two giant glass chandeliers, and a large bar. The food is absolutely delicious as was the service.

title: One of the highlights
text: Took a Tuk Tuk out to the falls from Labang Probang and had an awesome day. We followed the trail and came upon the falls which were spectacular. There is also a bear sanctuary.

title: Excellent
text: Spent a six hour session at the cooking school. Everything was superb!. We returned home and have cooked a few dishes, all delicious.

title: A Hidden Gem
text: I was taken here by my daughter. This is a small place that only seats about a dozen people. The fresh pasta and other dishes are truly authentic and delicious.

title: Great food, but...
text: I found this restaurant as the result of a search. Overall, the food was very good, but the service was not. We waited more than an hour for our food to be served.

title: Good Chinese and sushi choices
text: Came here with family for lunch. Everyone ordered as did and enjoyed their meal. I did not, having ordered eggplant in garlic sauce.

title: Great choices
text: Stopped into this coffee shop and we had two delicious cups of coffee. The environment is simple, plain but comfortable.

title: Absolutely delicious
text: It was a surprise that every dish we ordered was delicious. Lamb chops, crab cake, tuna meat balls, etc.

title: Dreamy
text: We really like going to this restaurant as it is on the water (inter coastal). there is an inside part and an comfortable outside area for dining.

title: A Must try!
text: Made our first visit to PHAT BOYS and loved it. We both ordered sushi rolls and shared. Service was very good.

title: A standard “classic”
text: Peter Pan has been around for a long time due to it’s very good service and food choices. Their coffee is fantastic and their deserts are delicious.
